00013 #define GLAZIERY_SLIDER(variable, area, groupField, \
00014    start, end, current) \
00015    Slider * variable; \
00016    if ((variable = new Slider) == NULL) \
00017       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00018    if (area != NULL) \
00019       ((FieldsArea *) area)->appendField(variable); \
00020    if (groupField != NULL) \
00021       ((GroupField *) groupField)->appendField(variable); \
00022    variable->setStart(start); \
00023    variable->setEnd(end); \
00024    variable->setCurrent(current);
00025 
00026 #define GLAZIERY_SLIDER_P(variable, area, groupField, px, py, \
00027    start, end, current) \
00028    GLAZIERY_SLIDER(variable, area, groupField, start, end, current) \
00029    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00030 
00031 #define GLAZIERY_SLIDER_S(variable, area, groupField, width, height, \
00032    start, end, current) \
00033    GLAZIERY_SLIDER(variable, area, groupField, start, end, current) \
00034    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00035       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00036 
00037 #define GLAZIERY_SLIDER_PS(variable, area, groupField, px, py, width, height, \
00038    start, end, current) \
00039    GLAZIERY_SLIDER(variable, area, groupField, start, end, current) \
00040    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00041    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00042       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00043 
00044 #define GLAZIERY_SLIDER_M(variable, area, groupField, minimumWidth, minimumHeight, \
00045    start, end, current) \
00046    GLAZIERY_SLIDER(variable, area, groupField, start, end, current) \
00047    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00048    variable->resizeToMinimum();
00049

00072 #define GLAZIERY_SLIDER_SL_CREATE(variable) \
00073    ArrayList<String> * variable; \
00074    if ((variable = new ArrayList<String>) == NULL) \
00075       throw EOUTOFMEMORY;
00076 
00077 #define GLAZIERY_SLIDER_SL_ITEM(variable, item) \
00078    { \
00079       String * clone; \
00080       if ((clone = new String(item)) == NULL) \
00081          throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00082       variable->Append(clone); \
00083    }

00085 #define GLAZIERY_SLIDER_SL_ATTACH(slider, stringList, target) \
00086    slider->attachStringList(stringList, target);
